subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han compound|口|麥|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=mouth; colloquial speech|no_och2=1}}.

For etymologies 1–3, this is based on {{cog|yue|麥|tr=mak6}}.

For etymology 4, this is based on {{cog|cmn|麥|tr=mài}}.
